channel.title: Recruiting a team
channel.description:
im not 100% sure if this is the correct place to post so i do apologise if it is not.
Im looking for some coders that are willing to help me with RSPS coding / making, dependant on work / time spent helping donations will be made to them via paypal
add me on msn for more information
steve-0_15@hotmail.co.uk
the 0 is the number not letter
steven :D :D
If you would like to help me in making a truely epic server
follow a small application form
Msn =
Experience in runescape=
experience in developing RSPS=
experence in coding=
experience in scripting=
what you could bring to the server=

item.title: Recruiting a team
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“cerberus15, post:9, topic:388290”]•Your need to provide some sort of evidence that your development team will be successful (ie, pictures).

i have experiance in runescape / runescape priavte servers, pictures are not avliable as recruting for a fresh project

•Your work must be your own. Stealing other people’s work is unacceptable and isn’t tolerated here.
the work is going to be the teams as its a fresh project

•Absolutely no advertising is allowed in this section. It is simply for recruiting people for your development team. You may discuss development here with your team, as well as discuss other features you plan on developing.
no adverts and the post clearly stats recruting for a team

•If you are going to post a website, you must first get it approved with an Administrator or a Global Moderator. Failure to do this will result in an infraction for advertising.
no website is posted…

no rules broken[/quote]
You need a picture.

Just put one up of a fresh folder if you literally have nothing in it. Or the client. And put your version and maybe some plans.

Also, not sure about offering money for people that help you is allowed to be publicly displayed, but that’s your own business.

Read full topic
